Subject: RE: CAP Policies are not working and files are not blocking ||GIIFT-24032025-CAP||
Description:
Dear Team,

We have created CAP policies but it is not working, we have tried multiple troubleshooting but we couldn't resolve the issue, we need your assistance to resolve the issue, kindly arrange the remote session on priority basis.

Regrads,
Sai
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter an issue with the CAP policy on their MacOS machines.

They have created 2 cap policies 
1 for windows and windows machine working fine without any issue the
1 for Mac   same policy they are applying mac but it's not working and some of the policies working partially, and they are not getting reports in CAP reports.

Server 5.9.4.1 and macos 3.4.1

Hosted by us.
Next_Steps__c:
We will schedule a remote session to check why the policy is not working.

In the session we have fixed the issue by enabling the Intercept VPN option.

We have made a follow up to check if we can proceed with the closure of this case.
